oauth_demo

Class OauthHttpd

  • java.lang.Object
    • oauth_demo.OauthHttpd

  • public class OauthHttpd
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a simple HTTP server on the computer running the demo.

    The server listens on host HttpConfig.HTTP_SERVER and port HttpConfig.HTTP_PORT. It runs indefinitely until the user presses Enter or interrupts using control-C. It serves various URLs, including:

    • HttpConfig.HOME_PAGE - display a home page (use this to test that the server is running ok)
    • HttpConfig.FINISH_PAGE - run the finish step of the Dropbox redirect workflow.
